str2: Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A space of time or interval; by extension, an individual opportunity; by implication, delay.
Forty years of age. From tessarakonta and etos; of forty years of age.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From pleres; to make replete, i.e. to cram, level up, or to furnish, satisfy, execute, finish, verify, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To go up, mount, ascend; of things: I rise, spring up, come up. From ana and the base of basis; to go up.
To look upon, visit, look out, select.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A son, descendent. Apparently a primary word; a 'son', used very widely of immediate, remote or figuratively, kinship.
Of Hebrew origin; Israel, the adopted name of Jacob, including his descendants.
